trends: There have been no other sightings in Fort AP Hill
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: moved in sharp turns and angles unlike any other aircraft i've seen.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the national boy scout jamboree in 2010 in Fort AP Hill, Virginia. late one night, just before bed, some boys saw a glowing dot very high up in the sky. They pointed it out to me and I saw it. It was indeed a small glowing dot that would have looked like a star except for the fact that it was moving accross the sky in a series of very sharp turns. It could drastically change direction without changing speed at all. It was seen by at least 8 people. I didn't really have any idea wha it could be until one of the other boys joked that it was ET.
